Name: Belzona 1111
ShortDescription: An epoxy-based composite for metal repair.

Name: Belzona 1121
ShortDescription: An epoxy-based repair composite with extended working life for metal repair.

Name: Belzona 1131
ShortDescription: A self-lubricating epoxy metal repair composite for creation of low friction surfaces and protection of lubrication systems from wear and seizure.

Name: Belzona 2111
ShortDescription: A flexible abrasion resistant polyurethane elastomer for the repair, rebuilding and coating of rubber components and metal surfaces.

Name: Belzona 2121
ShortDescription: A flexible abrasion resistant polyurethane elastomer for the coating of metal surfaces and rubber components.

Name: Belzona 2131
ShortDescription: A flexible abrasion resistant polyurethane elastomer for the casting of rubber components and coating of metal and rubber surfaces.

Name: Belzona 3111
ShortDescription: A single component, liquid-applied roof coating for long-term roof protection and waterproofing.

Name: Belzona 3121
ShortDescription: A liquid-applied emergency roof repair material providing instant waterproofing of leaking roof areas.

Name: Belzona 3131
ShortDescription: A liquid-applied roof coating for long-term protection and waterproofing of roofs which can be applied during winter weather conditions.

Name: Belzona 4111
ShortDescription: An epoxy repair composite for concrete and stone repair, resurfacing and protection.

Name: Belzona 4131
ShortDescription: An epoxy repair composite for the resurfacing and protection of concrete and stone areas.

Name: Belzona 4141
ShortDescription: A lightweight epoxy repair composite for vertical and overhead concrete and stone repairs.
